game.name: AEXXOS
game.genres: Massively Multiplayer, RPG, Free To Play, Early Access
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, In-App Purchases
game.shortDescription: Command 25 ship variants with 20+ upgrades in a living, multiplayer galaxy. Explore, trade, mine, and fight epic real-time battles. Forge alliances or betray rivals—your choices shape the universe. Dive into stunning space combat now!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Command 25 ship variants with 20+ upgrades in a living, multiplayer galaxy. Explore, trade, mine, and fight epic real-time battles. Forge alliances or betray rivals—your choices shape the universe. Dive into stunning space combat now!
